languages.text: "Внимание! Категорическое уведомление — обслуживающие единицы линии снабжения Нить-Каппа не уполномочены вступать в конфронтацию с Вольным Торговцем. Императив — отступление и инициация повторных переговоров".
"Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."
languages.original_text: "Внимание! Категорическое уведомление — обслуживающие единицы линии снабжения Нить-Каппа не уполномочены вступать в конфронтацию с Вольным Торговцем. Императив — отступление и инициация повторных переговоров".

traits.locale_text: "Attention! Priority notificiation. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."

languages.text: 「注目！優先告知。カッパ・スレッド供給網の修理班は自由開拓者と交戦する許可を得ていない。命令。撤退して交渉を再開せよ」
languages.original_text: "Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."

traits.locale_text: 「注目！優先告知。カッパ・スレッド供給網の修理班は自由開拓者と交戦する許可を得ていない。命令。撤退して交渉を再開せよ」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “注意！优先通知，卡帕供应线的服务单位并未得到授权与行商浪人对抗。传达命令：立刻撤退，重新开始谈判。”
languages.original_text: "Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."

traits.locale_text: “注意！优先通知，卡帕供应线的服务单位并未得到授权与行商浪人对抗。传达命令：立刻撤退，重新开始谈判。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Achtung! Prioritätsbenachrichtigung. Diensteinheiten der Kappa-Versorgungslinie sind nicht autorisiert, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} anzugreifen. Befehl: Rückzug und Wiedereintritt in Verhandlungen."
languages.original_text: "Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."

traits.locale_text: "Achtung! Prioritätsbenachrichtigung. Diensteinheiten der Kappa-Versorgungslinie sind nicht autorisiert, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} anzugreifen. Befehl: Rückzug und Wiedereintritt in Verhandlungen."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Alerte ! Notification prioritaire. Les unités au service du réseau de ravitaillement Kappa ne sont pas autorisées à prendre les armes contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ordre est donné de battre en retraite et de rouvrir les négociations. »
languages.original_text: "Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."

traits.locale_text: « Alerte ! Notification prioritaire. Les unités au service du réseau de ravitaillement Kappa ne sont pas autorisées à prendre les armes contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ordre est donné de battre en retraite et de rouvrir les négociations. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «¡Atención! Notificación prioritaria. Las unidades de servicio de la línea de suministros Brizna Kappa no tienen autorización para enfrentarse {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Órdenes: retirarse y reiniciar las negociaciones».
languages.original_text: "Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."

languages.text: "Dikkat! Birincil bildirim. Kappa Sırması ikmal hattı hizmet birimlerinin Hür Tacir ile çatışma izni bulunmamaktadır. Emir: Geri çekilin ve görüşmeleri yeniden başlatın."
languages.original_text: "Attention! Priority notification. Service units of the Kappa Thread supply line are unauthorised to confront the Rogue Trader. Command: retreat and re-initiate negotiations."
